code: import*as React from'react';const MISSING_CONTEXT_ERROR="Couldn't find a schedule context.";export const ScheduleUpdateContext=React.createContext({scheduleUpdate(){throw new Error(MISSING_CONTEXT_ERROR);},flushUpdates(){throw new Error(MISSING_CONTEXT_ERROR);}});export default function useScheduleUpdate(callback){const{scheduleUpdate,flushUpdates}=React.useContext(ScheduleUpdateContext);scheduleUpdate(callback);React.useEffect(flushUpdates);}
